en.name: Negotiating: tying the knot
en.coverDescription: Whether you are negotiating transactions with Chinese investors or discussing who is going to cook tonight, the principles of negotiation are the same. And just admit it, you always want the best outcome for yourself, right? But did you know that the best deal is not actually the one that makes both sides happy? This course will teach you how to settle down without settling for less. In other words: concede, but do not forget yourself!

fr.name: Marché conclu !
fr.coverDescription: Que vous négociez des transactions avec des investisseurs chinois ou que vous discutiez de qui va cuisiner ce soir, les principes de négociation sont les mêmes. Et admettez-le, vous souhaitez toujours le dénouement qui vous est le plus favorable, non ? Mais saviez-vous que la meilleure offre n'est pas forcément celle qui contente les deux parties ? Ce cours vous apprendra comment conclure un accord sans vous contenter du moins. En d'autres termes : concédez, mais ne vous oubliez pas !

de.name: Verhandle und schließe einen Deal ab
de.coverDescription:
DEMNÄCHST BALD AUF DEUTSCH
Whether you are negotiating transactions with Chinese investors or discussing who is going to cook tonight, the principles of negotiation are the same. And just admit it, you always want the best outcome for yourself, right? But did you know that the best deal is actually the one that makes both sides happy? This course will teach you how to settle down without settling for less. In other words: concede, but do not forget yourself!
